# Introduction {.unnumbered}

[Original homepage](https://uofudelphi.github.io/2023-05-17-Intro_R/)


This page contains the content for the R Software Carpentry workshop taught at the University of Utah on May 17-18.


**Instructors**: Rebecca Barter, George Vega Yon

These materials have been adapted from the original [Software Carpentry R for Reproducible Scientific Analysis workshop](https://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/).
